projects.title: Landing Page Template
projects.desc: A clean, responsive startup landing with premium motion + sections.
projects.problem: You need a production-ready UI foundation without reinventing layouts every time.
projects.system: Reusable components + consistent motion + responsive grid + theme support.
projects.solution: A clean, responsive startup landing with premium motion + sections.
projects.impact: Faster shipping, consistent UX, and a strong base to plug real data/features into.

highlights.title: Responsive sections
highlights.desc: Hero, features, pricing, and CTA blocks tuned for all screen sizes.

highlights.title: Motion system
highlights.desc: Scroll reveals and micro-interactions powered by Framer Motion variants.

highlights.title: Theme-ready
highlights.desc: Clean light/dark styling and reusable components for fast iterations.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard UI
projects.desc: Modern dashboard layout patterns (cards, tables, states) ready to wire to data.

highlights.title: SaaS dashboard patterns
highlights.desc: Cards, tables, and loading/empty states designed like real products.

highlights.title: Scalable component system
highlights.desc: Consistent spacing and UI tokens so new screens ship faster.

highlights.title: Data-ready layout
highlights.desc: Structured to plug into Firebase/REST APIs without redesigning the UI.

projects.title: Auth + Profile Flow
projects.desc: Login/signup screens with polished forms, states, and UX details.
projects.problem: You need a production-ready UI foundation without reinventing layouts every time.

highlights.title: Polished form UX

highlights.title: Complete user flow

highlights.title: Security-minded UI
highlights.desc: Password rules, feedback, and safe defaults built into the interface.
